attributes.action: Ensure the outcome of the feud between Sky and Virgin Media results in the best interests of the consumer and not their pockets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to avoid being penalised by Sky or Virgin Media the Government watchdog should intervene so that we the consumer are not left high and dry or shelling out a heavy increase to our subscriptions.
This has been borne from a power struggle and it is the consumer who pays, whether it be a service withdrawal or a fee increase.
They both need a good smack.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
